version_description:
1. You can adjust a background fading manually in "Fading BG"
2. Improves sticker quality
3. Adds new filters

â˜… Please, enjoy our new photo app "Tiled". 
Tile based stylish photo frame maker! 
If you like AfterFocus, you will also like TIled. 

Thank you.

1. Supports iPhone 5
2. Bigger max resolution on iPhone4s, iPhone5
3. Faster saving on iPhone4s, iPhone5 by making use of multicore CPU

UI Change
- Change app icon and title screen.
- Tool buttons are redesigned.  (clear and large)
- Increase the preview image resolution in editing.

Filter Improvement
- Add more filters.
- Add brightness & contrast adjustments in filter menu.

Fix Share
- Use native Twitter sharing on iOS5 & iOS6.
- Use native Facebook sharing on iOS6.
- Fix Flickr Upload.
- Add "Open In Other Apps".

Bug fix
- fix crash at touching review button in preferences.

More video exporting options
- add Flip, Flip Fast animation effect. 
- You can choose the animation type when save video.

AfterFocus for iOS has been updated to version 2. 
You can now make the short video with blur animation of a photo (not video).
It may be suitable for uploading to Instagram.

UPDATES:
- add animation exporting function (on iPhone4 or more recent devices)
- update for iOS 7 compatibility
- AfterFocus can be launched from other apps.
- fix app locked bug after saving of photo taken in burst mode. 

Have fun with new version of AfterFocus and merry christmas!

1. Saves original EXIF data to result image (require to turn on Location Service)
2. Adds Video help for Smart Selection
3. Adds integration with Instagram
4. Minor bug-fix

AfterFocus is now ver 3.0.0.
- new UI
- update for iOS 8
- increase image size for Instagram export

We regret that we have you wait for the update so long. We have never ceased our effort in improving AfterFocus. But our side projects other than AfterFocus delayed the release of the update. We would be able to focus on AfterFocus if our profit grows, thanks to your viral advertisement. ^^

We sincerely hope you like our renewed UI, motived by SLR camera's control panel. It would be our ultimate satisfaction if AfterFocus reminds you of fond memories of real camera.

Thank you for your continuous support, and we ask your passionate feedback and interest in our product.

- In case of not using 'mid' focus, enhance the edge anti-aliasing quality of final save image. 
- add export size for iPhone 6s & 6s Plus

The new app has been released, Stick'It.
With Stick'it, you can create cutout stickers and utilize them in many ways.
In setting menus, you can easily find app store shortcut for Stick'it.
If you like AfterFocus, you will also like it. 
Thanks!

- fix slider ui bug
- add export to Stick'it function in share menu
  
If Stick'it is installed, you can save the focused area as a reusable sticker in Stick'it.
If you like AfterFocus, you will also like Stick'it. 
Thanks!
